common.tagline: Remove watermarks from your images with clear.photo.

hero.title: Remove watermarks from your images automatically with AI.
hero.subtitle: clear.photo is the fastest, cheapest, and most advanced watermark remover you'll ever need.

showcase.title: Check out the results
showcase.subtitle: Our AI does the heavy lifting. Seamlessly remove text, logos, or any unwanted overlay from your pictures.

primaryFeatures.title: The features your business needs to eliminate watermarks for good.
primaryFeatures.subtitle: Whether you're a photographer or a social media manager, let our AI handle the cleanup so you can focus on creativity.

features.title: Automatic Watermark Removal
features.description: With our advanced AI, wipe off watermarks instantly. Just upload your file, and let clear.photo handle the rest.

features.title: Manual/Guided Erase
features.description: For tricky overlays, our guided removal tool helps you remove watermarks precisely—perfect for delicate logos.

features.title: Object Removal
features.description: Got extra elements cluttering your photo? Delete logos, text, or unwanted objects for a flawless finish.

features.title: API Integration
features.description: Integrate our watermark remove solution into your workflow. Bulk removal, e-commerce listings, or social media campaigns—our API has you covered.

secondaryFeatures.title: Simplify the process of removing watermarks and logos.
secondaryFeatures.subtitle: We believe in making your life easier, not harder. That's why clear.photo helps you clean up images seamlessly.

features.name: High-Quality Results
features.description: Our AI preserves the original photo's resolution. Even when you clear watermark text or remove a logo, the outcome looks natural.

features.name: Bulk Processing
features.summary: Save time with automated batch removal.
features.description: Managing multiple images? Our system handles large sets of photos in one go, so you can focus on creative tasks.

features.name: Multi-Platform Access
features.summary: Works on desktop, mobile, and via API.
features.description: No matter where you are or what device you use, clear.photo is here. Speed, consistency, and convenience—right at your fingertips.

callToAction.title: Get started today
callToAction.subtitle: Sign up for clear.photo and discover how easy it is to remove unwanted overlays. Reclaim your photos and keep your audience engaged with fresh visuals.

testimonials.title: Trusted by photographers, designers, and brands everywhere.
testimonials.subtitle: Our watermark remover has turned skeptics into believers. Read why people are raving about clear.photo.

testimonials.content: clear.photo made removing Shutterstock watermarks a breeze. My marketing materials look so clean now!
I needed to erase a logo from a picture for my website design. clear.photo worked like a charm, and the final result was flawless.
I can finally delete watermarks in bulk—something Photoshop alone couldn't handle effectively. clear.photo is a time-saver.
As a freelance photographer, I often see my original images watermarked by others. clear.photo makes it easy to get rid of them fast!
The best free watermark remover I've tried yet. Surprised by how well the AI reconstructs the background behind the text.
We've integrated clear.photo's API into our platform to automatically remove watermarks from photo submissions. Customers love the clean, professional look.

pricing.subtitle: From casual users to enterprise-level clients, our watermark remover fits your needs and budget perfectly.

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Looking for more details about how to remove a logo from a picture or how to clear watermarks effectively? We have answers.

questions.question: How does your watermark remover actually work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes the region around the watermark, reconstructs the background, and seamlessly cleans up the image.

questions.question: Will the final image quality be affected?
questions.answer: Our technology preserves resolution and color accuracy. In most cases, you won't notice any difference besides the watermark disappearing.

questions.question: Do you support bulk or batch removal?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our higher-tier plans offer bulk removal, and the Enterprise plan even removes unlimited watermarks with no daily cap.

questions.question: Can I remove Shutterstock or Getty Images watermarks?
questions.answer: Yes. clear.photo can eliminate any watermark, but please ensure you have the legal right to remove a watermark before doing so.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app to remove watermarks?
questions.answer: Yes! clear.photo works great on mobile browsers and we're developing a dedicated app to help you remove a watermark on the go.

questions.question: How accurate is the manual removal?
questions.answer: Manual removal provides precise control. You can highlight exactly which parts of the watermark need erasing, especially for complex overlays.

questions.question: How do I integrate the API for enterprise workflows?
questions.answer: Our Enterprise plan includes full API documentation. We'll guide you through authentication, request parameters, and bulk endpoint usage.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, new accounts get free tokens to remove or clean unwanted text from images. Sign up to get started instantly.

questions.question: How can I remove a logo from a picture if it's large?
questions.answer: Our advanced AI can handle logos of all sizes, whether it's a subtle watermark or a big overlay. Just upload your file and choose the removal mode.
